title: UAE education reform 2026: English mandatory for mathematics and science in private schools
summary_full: The UAE's Ministry of Education has mandated that advanced mathematics and science subjects will be taught in English across private schools, starting with Grade 9 in the 2026-2027 academic year. This phased implementation, extending to Grade 12 by 2029-2030, aims to equip students with global competencies for higher education and STEM careers where English is prevalent.
